title: Christmas Deals 2016
abstract: Check out these credit card deals, for shopping, dining, and vacationing!
content:
Christmas is around the corner — less than a month away! — and here's how you can capitalize on the holiday season. Discounted vacations, food, groceries, accessories... we've got it all (or tried to get it all).
We tried categorizing the holiday deals thematically, and hope this helps you invest/ splurge wisely. Please note that these are just credit card deals. Happy shopping and holiday planning!
Also note, if you want to see the most deals, check out our dedicated HSBC microsite here:
. You can also chat to our
, but he'll check if you've been naughty or nice first.
